sourcesContent: import styles from "./CartItem.module.css"; import { useRef, useState } from "react"; const CartItem = ({ cart }) => { const quantityRef = useRef(); const [newQuantity, setNewQuantity] = useState( +quantityRef.current.placeholder ); const increaseQuantityHanlder = () => { console.log(newQuantity); }; return ( {cart.product.name} {Number(cart.product.price).toLocaleString("de-DE")} VND {cart.total} ); }; export default CartItem;
